1Table includes data available through August 20, 2019. All data are reported unless otherwise noted. Grand totals and estimated data are rounded to no more than three significant digits
column2: may not add to totals shown. Data may include clinker exports for some countries.

column1: 2Production is based on fiscal year, with a starting date of June 30 of the year shown.
3Production is based on fiscal year, with a starting date of March 31 of the year shown.
4Production is based on fiscal year, with a starting date of July 7 of the year shown.
5Cement sales from Cimentos de Moçambique SARL (Sociedade Anónima de Responsabilidade Limitada) only.
6Portland and masonry cements only. Includes a small (less than 0.5% per year) component of double-counting where portland cement (not clinker) is consumed to make masonry cement
column2: the precise amount of double-counting cannot be determined because of the involvement of portland cement stockpiles.
